intro: Be the last one standing! Ultimate survival FPS paints Middle East red with blood! Take on impossible missions with devastating firepower from lethal weapons.
description:
This Nintendo Switch™ exclusive game is the ultimate survival FPS! Infiltrate dangerous Middle Eastern territories as a combat mercenary in this single-player FPS shooting game. Use abundant missions and diverse weapon systems to Enjoy an immersive battlefield experience.

・Experience overwhelming first-person shooter action with a realistic perspective.
・Intense combat missions are set across various Middle Eastern locations.
・Unlock precision shooting sniper mode after clearing story mode.
・Choose from a variety of weapons based on combat situations.
・A volume-packed story development as a professional combat mercenary executing various operations.
・Intuitive controls allow players of all levels to enjoy the game.
・Realistic combat environments recreated with high-quality 3D graphics.

Become a combat mercenary carrying out dangerous missions.
Survive the harsh Middle Eastern battlefields.
Clear all missions to become a true elite mercenary.

Prologue
The situation in the Middle East had reached its worst state in history.
As the international terrorist organization Desert Crime seized oil facilities, governments worldwide struggled to respond.
Amid this crisis, elite combat mercenary Jake McClane received an emergency request.
"Complete annihilation of Desert Crime. That's your mission."
He would face scorching deserts, cities turned to ruins, and death matches with ruthless enemies. What he didn't know was that this mission was merely the prologue to a much larger conspiracy.
"Survival probability: extremely low. Mission commence."
As sandstorms rage, a combat mercenary's brutal battle begins!
